title: Vote for Flo Rida to Win a 2012 American Music Award!
text:
Vote for Flo Rida to Win a 2012 American Music Award!
Congratulations to Flo Rida for his 2012 American Music Award Nomination for "Favorite Male Artist – Pop/Rock". The 40th Anniversary American Music Awards will broadcast live from the Nokia Theatre L.A. on Sunday, November 18th at 8pm EST on ABC!
The winners will be determined by online voting starting TODAY! Click HERE to vote now. Voting closes on November 9th
VOTE NOW
